name: iedgedg
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0))), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(cedg, c2)))

stmt.origin: syl6eleqr(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(cedg, c2), crn(c0), wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0))))
stmt.pretty: syl6eleqr((c0 ` c1), (Edg ` c2), ran(c0), (Fun(c0)∧ c1 ∈ dom(c0)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0))), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(cedg, c2)))
-| wi(wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0))), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), crn(c0)))
-| wceq(cfv(cedg, c2), crn(c0))

|- wi(wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0))), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(cedg, c2)))

-| wceq(cfv(cedg, c2), crn(c0))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0))), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), crn(c0)))

|- wi(wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0))), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(cedg, c2)))
-| wceq(cfv(cedg, c2), crn(c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((Fun(c0)∧ c1 ∈ dom(c0))→(c0 ` c1)∈(Edg ` c2))
⊣ (Edg ` c2)= ran(c0)

body.origin:
|- wceq(cfv(cedg, c2), crn(c0))
-| wceq(cfv(cedg, c2), crn(cfv(ciedg, c2)))
-| wceq(crn(c0), crn(cfv(ciedg, c2)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (Edg ` c2)= ran(c0)
⊣ (Edg ` c2)= ran((iEdg ` c2))
⊣ ran(c0)= ran((iEdg ` c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0))), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(cedg, c2)))

-| wceq(crn(c0), crn(cfv(ciedg, c2)))
cumulated.pretty:

⊣ ran(c0)= ran((iEdg ` c2))

-| wceq(crn(c0), crn(cfv(ciedg, c2)))
cumulated.pretty:

comment: An indexed edge is an edge. (Contributed by AV, 19-Dec-2021.)
